properties.name: camel.dataformat.gson.content-type-header
properties.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSON

properties.name: camel.dataformat.gson.date-format-pattern
properties.description: To configure the date format while marshall or unmarshall Date fields in JSON using Gson

properties.name: camel.dataformat.gson.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the gson data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.gson.pretty-print
properties.description: To enable pretty printing output nicely formatted. Is by default false.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.gson.unmarshal-type
properties.description: Class name of the java type to use when unmarshalling
